message.content:
{"id": "269522", 
"title": "Bug 269522 - Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice", 
"description": "There is an issue with cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice in Bug 269522.", 
"OB": "", 
"EB": "After selecting line 22, it can be observed that there are 5 joinpoints displayed when there should only be 3. Similarly, selecting line 68 shows zero joinpoints when there should be 2. Additionally, right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' shows all 5 joinpoints.", 
"SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
